{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$5.5M in 2021-2022** on contracts with CULLEN DIESEL POWER.

Across 46 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 5 have at least one amendment (11%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 40% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$142.2K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.38 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$297.2K. The longest contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$3.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
